Properties.ProtectedString:
-------- OMG HAX
r = game:service("RunService") debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local damage = 3
local myHumanoid = nil
local slash_damage = 6
sword = script.Parent.Handle Tool = script.Parent
local SmashSound = Instance.new("Sound") --SmashSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=21433696" SmashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SmashSound.Parent = sword SmashSound.Volume = .7 SmashSound.Pitch = 1
local SmashSound2 = Instance.new("Sound") --SmashSound2.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=21433711" SmashSound2.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordlunge.wav" SmashSound2.Parent = sword SmashSound2.Volume = .7 SmashSound2.Pitch = .4
local SmashSound3 = Instance.new("Sound") SmashSound3.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SmashSound3.Parent = sword SmashSound3.Volume = .2 SmashSound3.Pitch = 2
local sounds = {SmashSound, SmashSound2, SmashSound3}
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = sword UnsheathSound.Volume = .5 UnsheathSound.Pitch = 1.5
function blow(hit)
if (Tool.Enabled) then return end -- only damages on a swing if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end
local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function attack() damage = slash_damage
local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,-1,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function swordOut(angle) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(math.sin(angle),-math.cos(angle),0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-math.cos(angle),math.sin(angle),0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1)
--Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,-math.cos(angle),-math.sin(angle)) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,-math.sin(angle),math.cos(angle)) end
function swordAcross() -- parry end
Tool.Enabled = true local last_attack = -5 local charge = 0 local dragonFire = nil function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
print(charge)
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
swordOut(math.pi/40 * charge)
t = r.Stepped:wait()
if (t - last_attack < .5) then sounds[3]:Play() attack() if charge < 60 then wait(.05) swordOut(math.pi/40 * (charge + 1)) wait(.05) swordOut(math.pi/40 * (charge + 2)) wait(.05) swordOut(math.pi/40 * (charge + 3)) charge = charge + 4
if dragonFire == nil or dragonFire.Parent == nil then dragonFire = Instance.new("Part") dragonFire.Name = "DragonFire" dragonFire.CanCollide = false dragonFire.Shape = 0 dragonFire.Size = Vector3.new(charge/15,charge/15,charge/15) dragonFire.Transparency = 0 dragonFire.CFrame = Tool.Handle.CFrame dragonFire.Material = "Corroded Metal" dragonFire.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") dragonFire.TopSurface = 0 dragonFire.BottomSurface = 0
dragonWeld = Instance.new("Weld") dragonWeld.Name = "DragonWeld" dragonWeld.Part0 = dragonFire dragonWeld.Part1 = Tool.Handle dHeat = Instance.new("Fire") dHeat.Color = Color3.new(1,0,0) dHeat.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0,1,0) dHeat.Heat = charge / 3 dHeat.Name = "DragonHeat" dHeat.Size = charge / 10 dHeat.Parent = dragonFire dragonFire.Parent = Tool dragonWeld.Parent = dragonFire end
dHeat = dragonFire.DragonHeat dHeat.Heat = charge / 3 dHeat.Size = charge / 10 dragonFire.Size = Vector3.new(charge/15, charge/15, charge/15) dragonWeld = Instance.new("Weld") dragonWeld.Name = "DragonWeld" dragonWeld.Part0 = dragonFire dragonWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0,0,5) dragonWeld.Part1 = Tool.Handle dragonWeld.Parent = dragonFire
else wait(.15) end
else
attack()
if charge > 0 and myHumanoid ~= nil then sounds[2]:Play() -- fireball!! dweld = dragonFire:FindFirstChild("DragonWeld") newNV = Instance.new("NumberValue") newNV.Name = "Damage" newNV.Value = charge newNV.Parent = dragonFire if dweld ~= nil then dweld:remove() end lookAt = myHumanoid.TargetPoint - dragonFire.Position dragonFire.Velocity = lookAt.unit*50 dragonFire.Position = dragonFire.Position + lookAt.unit*5 dragonFire.Parent = game.Workspace dragonFire.CanCollide = true dFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") dFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, dragonFire:GetMass()*workspace.Gravity, 0) dFloat.Name = "DFloat" dFloat.Parent = dragonFire
dScript = Tool.FireballScript:Clone() dScript.Parent = dragonFire dScript.Disabled = false
dragonFire = nil end if charge <= 0 then sounds[1]:Play() wait(.1) elseif dragonFire ~= nil and dragonFire.Parent ~= nil then while dragonFire.Transparency < 1 do dragonFire.Transparency = dragonFire.Transparency + .05 if charge > 0 then charge = charge - 1 swordOut(math.pi/40 * charge) end wait(.05) end while charge > 0 do charge = charge - 1 swordOut(math.pi/40 * charge) wait(.05) end dragonFire:remove() wait(2) else while charge > 0 do charge = charge - 2 swordOut(math.pi/40 * charge) wait(.05) end wait(2) end -- potentially fire and uncharge end
last_attack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vChar = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") UnsheathSound:play() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local fireball = script.Parent local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local chargeForce = fireball.Damage.Value local damageToDeal = .50 + chargeForce/100
local ember = Instance.new("Part") ember.Transparency = 1 ember.Shape = 0 ember.formFactor = 0 ember.Size = Vector3.new(0,0,0) ember.TopSurface = 0 ember.BottomSurface = 0 ember.Locked = true
local emberFire = Instance.new("Fire") emberFire.Color = Color3.new(1,160/255,51/255) emberFire.Size = 2 emberFire.Parent = ember
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,90,0) force.Parent = ember
function makeEmbers()
for i = 1, 5 do local er = ember:clone() er.Position = fireball.Position er.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-20,20),math.random(10,25),math.random(-20,20)) er.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(er,2) end
end
local touching = false
fireball.Touched:connect(function(part)
local human = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if human ~= nil and touching == false then script.Parent = human.Parent touching = true makeEmbers() local fire = fireball.DragonHeat:clone() fireball.DragonHeat:Destroy() fire.Parent = part debris:AddItem(fire, 10) fireball:Destroy() for i = 1, 100 do --if fire.Enabled == true then human:TakeDamage(0.59) end -- make this go from .25 to .96 based on size of projectile! if fire.Enabled == true then human:TakeDamage(damageToDeal) end wait(0.1) end script:Destroy() touching = false end
end)
wait(8) fireball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
